DescriptionData.Title: Temporary Tattoos (144/Pack) - Retro
DescriptionData.Description:
Temporary Tattoos are fun and easy to apply! 144 individual tattoos per set. Tattoos may vary from images shown.
Temporary Tattoo directions are simple. 1. Cut out Tattoo, skin should be clean and free of oils and makeup. 2. Remove clear, protective top sheet and place Tattoo face down on skin. 3. Wet back of Tattoo thoroughly with wet sponge or paper towel, press down and hold 30 seconds. 5. Slide off paper backing. Wash gently w/ soap and water for a more realistic look. 6. Tattoos will last 5-7 days, even while swimming and bathing (Tattoos may come off in chlorinated water). To remove just saturate area with rubbing alcohol or baby oil, wait 10 seconds and rub off.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Tattoos last 5 to 7 days (exposure to chlorinated water may reduce time frame)
Easily removed with rubbing alcohol or baby oil
